articles.author: Mallika Soni
articles.title: Plane grounded in France with 300 Indians: Airport makeshift base, crew quizzed - Hindustan Times
articles.description: France Grounds Plane: The flight, which was operated by Romanian charter company Legend Airlines, landed at Vatry for a technical stopover en route from Dubai. | World News
articles.content: Over 300 Indians who were on board a plane grounded in France on suspicion of human trafficking were being cared for in the hall of an airport in Marne while an investigation was ongoing, a local off… [+1997 chars]
